modName: Black Books work in Skyrim too
summary: Makes the Black Books from Dragonborn work in Skyrim as well.
descriptionHtml:
I find it strange that you can only reach Apocrypha from Solstheim.  This mod changes that, so the Black Books work from Skyrim as well.  Why would you want that?  [s]STORAGE.  There are many containers in Apocrypha, and I believe they are all safe.[/s]  Access to the Dragonborn perks without having to travel to Soltheim first, as well.

This mod replaces a single script, DLC2BookDungeonControllerScript.  All I did was comment out a few of the lines that check to see if you\'re in Apocrypha or Solstheim, so now it is assumed that if you\'re not in Apocrypha, then you\'re good to go.

INSTALLATION:  Because this is just a change of a script, NO ESP IS REQUIRED.  Just unzip and drop the PEX file in your skyrim/data/scripts folder and you\'re ready to go.  The other file is the source code, showing the changes I made (the lines that start with double-semi-colons), and you can just ignore it.

Or just use NMM. 

UNINSTALLATION:  Delete the script from your skyrim/data/scripts folder.

REQUIREMENTS:  Dragonborn.

RECOMMENDED: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25068//?]Placeable Statics[/url].  Apocrypha makes a pretty interesting player home.  Rather short on furniture and equipment, but all that can be added with Placeable Statics.  I\'m sure Hermaeus Mora makes an exciting roommate, as well.

BUGS: Report them as you find them!

PICS: If you do make your player home on Apocrypha, please share some pics!  I\'d love to see what chaos I\'ve influcted on ol\' Hermaeus.
author: Gizmologist

files.name: Black Books Work Anywhere NMM version
